name: WaterHouse Projects
tag_list: android, windows-8, crm, pos, inventory, singapore
overview:
WaterHouse Projects is a Singapore based mobile application company that is passionate about creating innovative solutions for endusers.

With a Group of experienced IT professionals, WaterHouse Projects aim to discover and produce useful products to improve lives and make little things in life simpler and easier.

WaterHouse Projects specialize in mobile apps development and conversion from ios convertion to android and windows 8 platform. WaterHouse Projects also povides professional services which are tailored to help Government and private businesses to apply technology as the enabler of their operations.
